attributes.name: Attempt to Create Okta API Token v102.0.1
attributes.description: Detects attempts to create an Okta API token. An adversary may create an Okta API token to maintain access to an organization's network while they work to achieve their objectives. An attacker may abuse an API token to execute techniques such as creating user accounts or disabling security rules or policies.
author: Elastic
false_positives: If the behavior of creating Okta API tokens is expected, consider adding exceptions to this rule to filter false positives.
attributes.setup: The Okta Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
